reviewText:
My favorite guitar teacher, Danny Gill, he might talk fast (not really?), but keep in mind it's a DVD tutorial so fast is good. (As you can always roll back)
Everything he says is right on point, unlike some free teachers on YouTube they talk pointless but sound like your friend.
Well I guess I prefer to learn from a real teacher who can save me more time for practicing rather than just sit, listen and still don't know what happened.

Recommend for all beginners, good rhythm in it, you won't be bored.
